question: Which of the following sects of Vaishnavism in hinduism is oldest among the given four options?
explanation:
• Nimbarka Sampradaya was founded by Nimbarka in 7th century CE.
  • Brahm Sampraday is related to Madhvacharya, who lived in 13-14th century CE.
  • Sri Sampraday was founded by Nathamuni in 10th century CE and was expanded by Ramanuja of the 11th century.
  • Rudra Sampradya was started by Vishnuswami, who lived in 600 BC. Thus, this sect is oldest.
